Docs.summary: Gets or sets a private storage field to hold the value from a column.
Docs.value: The name of the storage field.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Storage property values are case sensitive. For example, ensure that values used in the attribute for the Storage property match the case for the corresponding property names used elsewhere in the code. This applies to all .NET programming languages, even those which are not typically case sensitive, including Visual Basic.
## Examples
```vb <Column(Storage:=_CustomerID)> _ Public CustomerID As String ```
```csharp [Column(Storage="_CustomerID")] public string CustomerID { } ```
